00348     class Ctx {
00349     public:
00350         Ctx();
00351         ~Ctx();
00353         I32 arg_len() {
00354             return (I32)(PL_stack_sp - mark);
00355         }
00357         Scalar* arg(int n) {
00358             Scalar*s = new Scalar(fetch_stack(n));
00359             this->register_allocated(s);
00360             return s;
00361         }
00363         void ret(Scalar s) {
00364             this->ret(0, &s);
00365         }
00366         void ret(Scalar* s) {
00367             this->ret(0, s);
00368         }
00369         void ret(int n, Scalar* s) {
00370             this->ret(n, s ? s->serialize() : &PL_sv_undef);
00371         }
00372         void ret(int n, SV* s) {
00373             PL_stack_base[ax + n] = s;
00374         }
00376         bool wantarray() {
00377             return GIMME_V & G_ARRAY ? true : false;
00378         }
00380         void return_multi(std::vector<Scalar*>& vec) {
00381             if (vec.size() != 0) {
00382                 SV** sp = PL_stack_sp;
00383                 if ((unsigned int)(PL_stack_max - sp) < vec.size()) {
00384                     sp = stack_grow(sp, sp, vec.size());
00385                 }
00386 
00387                 std::vector<Scalar*>::iterator iter;
00388                 for (iter = vec.begin(); iter != vec.end(); iter++) {
00389                     PL_stack_base[ax++] = *iter ? (*iter)->serialize() : &PL_sv_undef;
00390                 }
00391                 ax--;
00392             } else {
00393                 this->return_undef();
00394             }
00395         }
00397         void return_true() {
00398             this->ret(0, &PL_sv_yes);
00399         }
00401         void return_undef() {
00402             this->ret(0, &PL_sv_undef);
00403         }
00409         void register_allocated(Value* v) {
00410             allocated.push_back(v);
00411         }
00412     protected:
00417         SV* fetch_stack(int n) {
00418             return PL_stack_base[this->ax + n];
00419         }
00420         I32 ax;
00421         SV ** mark;
00422         std::vector<Value*> allocated;
00423     };
00424     std::vector<Ctx*> ctxstack;
00425     Ctx::Ctx() {
00426         // same as dAXMARK
00427         this->ax = *PL_markstack_ptr + 1;
00428         --PL_markstack_ptr;
00429         this->mark = PL_stack_base + ax - 1;
00430 
00431         ctxstack.push_back(this);
00432     }
00433     Ctx::~Ctx() {
00434         std::vector<Value*>::iterator iter;
00435         for (iter = allocated.begin(); iter != allocated.end(); iter++) {
00436             delete *iter;
00437         }
00438 
00439         PL_stack_sp = PL_stack_base + ax;
00440 
00441         ctxstack.pop_back();
00442     }

00448     public:

00450             return ctxstack[ctxstack.size()-1];

00460     Reference * Hash::fetch(const char* key) {
00461         // SV**    hv_fetch(HV* tb, const char* key, I32 klen, I32 lval)
00462         SV ** v = hv_fetch((HV*)this->val, key, strlen(key), 0);
00463         if (v) {
00464             Reference * ref = new Reference(*v);
00465             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00466             return ref;
00467         } else {
00468             return NULL;
00469         }
00470     }

00473         if (v) {

00475             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);

00478             return NULL;

00493     Scalar * Array::store(I32 key, Scalar* _v) {
00494         _v->refcnt_inc();
00495         SV** v = av_store((AV*)this->val, key, _v->val);
00496         if (v) {
00497             Reference * ref = new Reference(*v);
00498             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00499             return ref;
00500         } else {
00501             return NULL;
00502         }

00542     class BootstrapCtx : public Ctx {
00543     public:
00544         BootstrapCtx() : Ctx() {
00545             xs_version_bootcheck();
00546         }
00547         ~BootstrapCtx() {
00548             PL_stack_base[this->ax] = &PL_sv_yes;
00549             PL_stack_sp = PL_stack_base + this->ax;
00550         }
00551     protected:
00552         // XS_VERSION_BOOTCHECK
00553         void xs_version_bootcheck() {
00554             SV *_sv;
00555             const char *vn = NULL, *module = SvPV_nolen_const(ST(0));
00556             if (this->arg_len() >= 2) {
00557                 /* version supplied as bootstrap arg */
00558                 _sv = PL_stack_base[ax+1];
00559             } else {
00560                 /* XXX GV_ADDWARN */
00561                 _sv = get_sv(Perl_form(aTHX_ "%s::%s", module,
00562                         vn = "XS_VERSION"), FALSE);
00563                 if (!_sv || !SvOK(_sv))
00564                 _sv = get_sv(Perl_form(aTHX_ "%s::%s", module,
00565                             vn = "VERSION"), FALSE);
00566             }
00567             if (_sv) {
00568                 SV *xssv = Perl_newSVpv(aTHX_ XS_VERSION, 0);
00569                 xssv = new_version(xssv);
00570                 if ( !sv_derived_from(_sv, "version") ) {
00571                     _sv = new_version(_sv);
00572                 }
00573                 if ( vcmp(_sv,xssv) ) {
00574                     Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s object version %"SVf" does not match %s%s%s%s %"SVf,
00575                         module, SVfARG(vstringify(xssv)),
00576                         vn ? "$" : "", vn ? module : "", vn ? "::" : "",
00577                         vn ? vn : "bootstrap parameter", SVfARG(vstringify(_sv)));
00578                 }
00579             }
00580         }
00581     };
00582 
00586     class Code : public Scalar {
00587     public:
00588         Code(SV * _s) : Scalar(_s) { }
00590         void call(Array * args, Array* retval) {
00591             SV **sp = PL_stack_sp;
00592 
00593             push_scope(); // ENTER
00594             save_int((int*)&PL_tmps_floor); // SAVETMPS
00595             PL_tmps_floor = PL_tmps_ix;
00596 
00597             if (++PL_markstack_ptr == PL_markstack_max) { // PUSHMARK(SP);
00598                 markstack_grow();
00599             }
00600             *PL_markstack_ptr = (I32)((sp) - PL_stack_base);
00601 
00602             for (int i =0; i < args->len()+1; i++) {
00603                 if (PL_stack_max - sp < 1) { // EXTEND()
00604                     // optimize?
00605                     sp = stack_grow(sp, sp, 1);
00606                 }
00607                 *++sp = args->pop()->val; // XPUSHs
00608             }
00609             PL_stack_sp = sp; // PUTBACK
00610 
00611             int count = call_sv(this->val, G_ARRAY);
00612 
00613             sp = PL_stack_sp; // SPAGAIN
00614 
00615             for (int i=0; i<count; i++) {
00616                 Scalar * s = new Scalar(*sp--);
00617                 CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00618                 retval->store(i, s);
00619             }
00620 
00621             PL_stack_sp = sp; // PUTBACK
00622             if (PL_tmps_ix > PL_tmps_floor) { // FREETMPS
00623                 free_tmps();
00624             }
00625             pop_scope(); // LEAVE
00626         }
00627     };

00632     class Pointer : public Scalar {
00633     public:
00634         Pointer(SV* s) : Scalar(s) { }
00636         Pointer(void* _ptr, const char* klass) : Scalar(sv_newmortal()) {
00637             if (_ptr == NULL) {
00638                 sv_setsv(this->val, &PL_sv_undef);
00639             } else {
00640                 sv_setref_pv(this->val, klass, _ptr);
00641             }
00642         }
00643 
00647         template <class T>
00648         T* extract() {
00649             return INT2PTR(T *, SvROK(this->val) ? SvIV(SvRV(this->val)) : SvIV(this->val));
00650         }
00651     };

00671     Str* Scalar::as_str() {
00672         if (SvPOK(this->val)) {
00673             Str * s = new Str(this->val);
00674             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00675             return s;
00676         } else {
00677             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a string",
00678                 "Devel::BindPP",
00679                 "sv");
00680         }
00681     }

00746     Hash * Reference::as_hash() {
00747         if (SvROK(this->val) && SvTYPE(SvRV(this->val))==SVt_PVHV) {
00748             HV* h = (HV*)SvRV(this->val);
00749             Hash * hobj = new Hash(h);
00750             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(hobj);
00751             return hobj;
00752         } else {
00753             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a hash reference",
00754                 "Devel::BindPP",
00755                 "hv");
00756         }
00757     }
00758     Array * Reference::as_array() {
00759         SV* v = this->val;
00760         if (SvROK(v) && SvTYPE(SvRV(v))==SVt_PVAV) {
00761             AV* a = (AV*)SvRV(v);
00762             Array * obj = new Array(a);
00763             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(obj);
00764             return obj;
00765         } else {
00766             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a array reference",
00767                 "Devel::BindPP",
00768                 "av");
00769         }
00770     }
00771     Scalar * Reference::as_scalar() {
00772         SV* v = this->val;
00773         if (v && SvROK(v)) {
00774             SV* a = (SV*)SvRV(v);
00775             Scalar * obj = new Scalar(a);
00776             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(obj);
00777             return obj;
00778         } else {
00779             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a array reference",
00780                 "Devel::BindPP",
00781                 "sv");
00782         }
00783     }
00784     Code * Reference::as_code() {
00785         SV* v = this->val;
00786         if (v && SvROK(v)) {
00787             SV* a = (SV*)SvRV(v);
00788             Code * obj = new Code(a);
00789             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(obj);
00790             return obj;

00792             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a array reference",

00798     Reference* Hash::del(const char*key, I32 klen) {
00799         Reference * ref = new Reference(hv_delete((HV*)this->val, key, klen, 0));
00800         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00801         return ref;
00802     }
00803     Reference* Hash::store(const char*key, I32 klen, Scalar*value) {
00804         value->refcnt_inc();
00805         SV ** s = hv_store((HV*)this->val, key, klen, value->val, 0);
00806         assert(s && SvROK(*s));
00807         Reference * ref = new Reference(*s);
00808         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00809         return ref;
00810     }

00812         Scalar*s = new Scalar(hv_scalar((HV*)this->val));
00813         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00814         return s;
00815     }
